verses.verse: Woe <S%H1945><s%> to those who devise <S%H2803><s%> iniquity <S%H205><s%> and work <S%H6466><s%> evil <S%H7451><s%> on their beds! <S%H4904><s%> When the morning <S%H1242><s%> is light, <S%H216><s%> they practice <S%H6213><s%> it, <S%H3426><s%> because it is in the power <S%H410><s%> of their hand. <S%H3027><s%>

They covet <S%H2530><s%> fields, <S%H7704><s%> and seize <S%H1497><s%> them; <S%H1004><s%> and houses, and take them away: <S%H5375><s%> and they oppress <S%H6231><s%> a man <S%H1397><s%> and his house, <S%H1004><s%> even a man <S%H376><s%> and his heritage. <S%H5159><s%>

Therefore thus says <S%H559><s%> Yahweh: <S%H3068><s%> "Behold, <S%H2803><s%> I am planning against these people <S%H4940><s%> a disaster, <S%H7451><s%> from which you will not remove <S%H4185><s%> your necks, <S%H6677><s%> neither will you walk <S%H3212><s%> haughtily; <S%H7317><s%> for it is an evil <S%H7451><s%> time. <S%H6256><s%>

In that day <S%H3117><s%> they will take up <S%H5375><s%> a parable <S%H4912><s%> against you, <S%H5091><s%> and lament with a doleful <S%H5093><s%> lamentation, <S%H5092><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%> <S%H7703><s%> 'We are utterly ruined! <S%H7703><s%> My people <S%H5971><s%>'s possession <S%H2506><s%> is divided <S%H4171><s%> up. <S%H4185><s%> Indeed he takes it from me and assigns <S%H2505><s%> our fields <S%H7704><s%> to traitors! <S%H7725><s%>'"
Therefore you will have no one who divides <S%H7993><s%> the land <S%H2256><s%> by lot <S%H1486><s%> in the assembly <S%H6951><s%> of Yahweh. <S%H3068><s%>
"Don't <S%H5197><s%> prophesy!" They prophesy. <S%H5197><s%> "Don't <S%H5197><s%> prophesy about these things. <S%H3639><s%> Disgrace won't <S%H5253><s%> overtake us."

Shall it be said, <S%H559><s%> O house <S%H1004><s%> of Jacob: <S%H3290><s%> "Is the Spirit <S%H7307><s%> of Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> angry? <S%H7114><s%> Are these his doings? <S%H4611><s%> Don't <S%H1697><s%> my words do good <S%H3190><s%> to him who walks <S%H1980><s%> blamelessly? <S%H3477><s%>"

But lately <S%H865><s%> my people <S%H5971><s%> have risen up <S%H6965><s%> as an enemy. <S%H341><s%> You strip <S%H6584><s%> the robe <S%H145><s%> and <S%H4136><s%> clothing <S%H8008><s%> from those who pass <S%H5674><s%> by without a care, <S%H983><s%> returning <S%H7725><s%> from battle. <S%H4421><s%>

You drive the women <S%H802><s%> of my people <S%H5971><s%> out <S%H1644><s%> from their pleasant <S%H8588><s%> houses; <S%H1004><s%> from their young children <S%H5768><s%> you take away <S%H3947><s%> my blessing <S%H1926><s%> forever. <S%H5769><s%>

Arise, <S%H6965><s%> and depart! <S%H3212><s%> For this is not your resting <S%H4496><s%> place, <S%H2930><s%> because of uncleanness that destroys, <S%H2254><s%> even with a grievous <S%H4834><s%> destruction. <S%H2256><s%>

If <S%H3863><s%> a man <S%H376><s%> walking <S%H1980><s%> in a spirit <S%H7307><s%> of falsehood <S%H8267><s%> lies: <S%H3576><s%> "I will prophesy <S%H5197><s%> to you of wine <S%H3196><s%> and of strong drink; <S%H7941><s%>" he would be the prophet <S%H5197><s%> of this people. <S%H5971><s%>

I will surely <S%H622><s%> assemble, <S%H622><s%> Jacob, <S%H3290><s%> all of you; <S%H6908><s%> I will surely gather <S%H6908><s%> the remnant <S%H7611><s%> of Israel; <S%H3478><s%> I will put <S%H7760><s%> them together <S%H3162><s%> as the sheep <S%H6629><s%> of Bozrah, <S%H1223><s%> as a flock <S%H5739><s%> in the midst <S%H8432><s%> of their pasture; <S%H1699><s%> they will swarm <S%H1949><s%> with people. <S%H120><s%>

He who breaks <S%H6555><s%> open the way goes up <S%H5927><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> them. <S%H6555><s%> They break through <S%H5674><s%> the gate, <S%H8179><s%> and go out. <S%H3318><s%> And their king <S%H4428><s%> passes <S%H5674><s%> on before <S%H6440><s%> them, <S%H3068><s%> with Yahweh at their head. <S%H7218><s%>
